name: Maximum Sum of Products
statement: You are given two integer arrays $$$a$$$ and $$$b$$$ of length $$$n$$$. You can reverse at most one subarray (continuous subsegment) of the array $$$a$$$. Your task is to reverse such a subarray that the sum $$$\sum\limits_{i=1}^n a_i \cdot b_i$$$ is maximized .
inputFormat: The first line contains one integer $$$n$$$ ($$$1 \le n \le 5000$$$). The second line contains $$$n$$$ integers $$$a_1, a_2, \dots, a_n$$$ ($$$1 \le a_i \le 10^7$$$). The third line contains $$$n$$$ integers $$$b_1, b_2, \dots, b_n$$$ ($$$1 \le b_i \le 10^7$$$).
outputFormat: Print single integer â€” maximum possible sum after reversing at most one subarray (continuous subsegment) of $$$a$$$.
